title: Fang Kaitai
summary: Fang Kaitai (Chinese: 方开泰; born 1940), also known as Kai-Tai Fang, is a Chinese mathematician and statistician who has helped to develop  generalized multivariate analysis, which extends classical multivariate analysis beyond the multivariate normal distribution to more general elliptical distributions.[7][8] He has also contributed to the design of experiments.
